resources.string: Join in on the fun, explore Bermuda\'s most famous and historical landmarks!

1. Click start below
 
2. Locate the Weekly Hunts
 
3. Find and scan each location
 
4. Head to one of our sponsors to claim your prize!

The 2018 TLF students created this app to give people something else to do during their time in Bermuda. 

The Round D Island application has been designed for the use of tourists and locals to allow them to explore and learn about landmarks in Bermuda. Currently the app is only for the use of android devices. Individuals will be allowed to download the app from our website which will allow them to explore and learn about significant Bermudian landmarks. 

The TLF program is an intensive 12-week summer internship where IT college students acquire experience in the ICT industry through classroom learning, team projects, fieldwork.
